thread.section_title: Nelson Alexander Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nelson Alexander | www.nelsonalexander.com.au
thread.title: Feridun

author: Feridun
title: Feridun
text:
A huge THANK YOU to the team of Nelson Alexander Coburg for yet another fantastic marketing and sales campaign.
SOLD before auction in a matter of weeks!
That makes three out of three in two months.
You guys are absolutely fantastic and working with your for nearly six years the list keeps on growing and my smile keeps getting bigger and bigger.
Personally I fail to comprehend why anyone would bother with another agent - but hey that's just my opinion.
Craig - incredible work with the Property Management to get property ready in a flash
Lisa - I know my perfectionism and constant adjustments can require a bit of patience and I admire how well you take it and how swiftly you attend to any and all of them
Damian - the quiet achiever
Steven Shaw - mediator, negotiator, salesman, auctioneer extraordinaire - and a TV celebrity too ;-)
Ready for the next one?
